Package Characters

Class PlayerActor

java.lang.Object
Characters.Character
Characters.PlayerActor
public class PlayerActor extends Character
This PlayerActor refers to the main character controlled by the user. The player should be able to pickup items, move north, south, east, and west, and have a set amount of health. The player can only be on one map at a time. The player will always spawn at the map's startCell.
